meanings.definition: A person who practices sorcery or magic.
meanings.sent1: The sorcerer cast a spell to make the flowers bloom.
meanings.sent2: The villagers feared the sorcerer's mystical abilities.
meanings.sent3: The sorcerer tried to make a sandwich disappear, but it ended up on his head instead.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a magical quality, like those of a sorcerer weaving a spell.
meanings.sent5: The sorcerer's cloak billowed behind him as he summoned a gust of wind.

meanings.definition: One who is believed to have supernatural powers.
meanings.sent1: The old man in the forest was rumored to be a sorcerer with special gifts.
meanings.sent2: In the ancient tales, the sorcerer could control the elements with a wave of his hand.
meanings.sent3: The sorcerer's cat was convinced it had the power to make the sun rise early.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was so sharp, it was as if she had the instincts of a sorcerer.
meanings.sent5: The children whispered stories of the sorcerer who could talk to animals and trees.
